fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A photo taken inside the 007 Elements museum in Austria was captioned as showing a helicopter. It was of a twin-engined plane, from the film Spectre (The name’s Bond, 26 February, page 29). • Homophone corner: “Diamonds on the Souls of her Shoes” (Joseph Shabalala obituary, 15 February, page 8, Journal). • Other recently amended articles include: NHS failing stroke patients with ‘postcode lottery rehabilitation’ The Barclay family feud threatening to end an empire The Guardian view on apprenticeships: failing the young Germany shooting: far-right gunman kills 10 in Hanau Caroline Flack: scale of negative media coverage before death revealed Meera Sodha’s vegan recipe for soba noodle soup with caramelised cabbage and pickles Taiwanese sci-fi and Spanish superheroes: the best global TV you can stream
